ConnectionPool.name: BSC
ConnectionPool.user: UPDATE ME WITH RCU SCHEMA USER NAME
ConnectionPool.dataSource: (DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=VALUEOF(**** THIS IS BSC CONNCTION POOL DATA, FOR SCORECARD ANNOTATIONS, UPDATE ME WITH RCU DB HOST TO MAKE ME FUNCTIONAL***))(PORT=VALUEOF(**** UPDATE ME WITH RCU DB PORT***))))(CONNECT_DATA=(SID=VALUEOF(**** THIS IS BSC CONNECTION POOL DATA IN OBIEE SEMANTIC LAYER, FOR SCORECARD ANNOTATIONS. PLEASE UPDATE THIS STRING IN RPD WITH YOUR RCU DB HOST TO MAKE SCORECARD ANNOTATIONS FUNCTIONAL****))))
ConnectionPool.Description: This database is only used for Scorecard Annotations feature. It is not mandatory for SampleAppLite to work. It needs to be configured to point to the ORCL Database created by the installation process. Please update the connection pool with the correct host name and credentials.
